attributes.action: raise the payments that carers get
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you have a member of your family, who has given up work to care for you in your own home. then join the many people who are only receiving £46 weekly. for giving 24-7 days weekly. this is not enough for them to be able to save for their old age pension, or to live on .ie, clothe and feed themselves. they need more now not tomorrow join me in this petition and sign up now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
